DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Channel where bot will send logs and updates. ex: '-123456'

PREFIX_HANDLER.description: Prefix(es) for bot commands, separated by space (e.g., '/ ! $').

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Channel where bot updates will be posted.

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Channel where bot updates will be posted.

TIME_API_KEY.description: Required for timezone information. Get yours from https://timezonedb.com/api

DEV_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs for bot developers.

SUDO_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs to assign as sudo users.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs who are whitelisted.

GENIUS_API.description: Your Genius API token to fetch song lyrics.

BDB_URI.description: Additional MongoDB URI to store extra information.

RMBG_API.description: Your Remove.bg API key to remove image backgrounds.

WORKERS.description: Number of workers to run the bot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get bot token from @BotFather on TG
